name: The Electrical Counter
tag_list: electrical-wholesale, consumer-units, extractor-fans, heating, dryers, ceiling-fans, security-systems
overview:
The Electrical Counter is a large UK based electrical wholesale and trade company offering a vast range of electrical products and equipment for both trade and home use.

Based in Ashford Kent, The Electrical Counter have been providing wholesale electrical items throughout the south east of England from their electrical counter and across the UK online for a wide customer base.

You will find a wide range of top quality, best brand products such as - but not limited to - heating and cooling, fantasia ceiling fans, consumer units, extractor fans, smoke alarms, fuses, dryers, lamps, lighting, test equipment, power tools and much much more!

Every order placed over Â£90 GBP is sent out on free delivery.
